name: Cube Runner (itch) (Defacube)
description:
(alt+f4 to exit)

start button doesnt work, it starts automatically (for some reason, idk why fr). basically, you need to avoid red stuff by moving with A/D keys. there is a total of 2 levels in this (for now). and yes both of them are possible

huge thanks to brackeys yt channel for a tutorial of this.
